treatments.title: Thai Massage
treatments.description: A type of full body massage that uses a mixture of deep tissue pressure, muscle and joint stretching, and gentle adjustments of the body into yoga-like poses

treatments.title: Sport Massage
treatments.description: A type of massage designed to help athletes before, during and after training. Sports massage can help you to: increase flexibility, prevent injuries, improve performance

treatments.title: Aromatherapy Massage
treatments.description: Combines the power of essential oils with massage therapy, benefiting both the mind and the body. It is a holistic experience meant to improve your physical and mental well-being

treatments.title: Swedish Massage
treatments.description: Classic Swedish massage techniques for ultimate relaxation

treatments.title: Original Moroccan Bath
treatments.description: The MOROCCAN BATH, also known as Hammam, is an ancient bathing ritual that has been cherished for centuries in Moroccan culture. Unlike other spas, which may focus solely on luxury, our Moroccan bath emphasizes skin care and the use of TRADITIONAL PRODUCTS. It's a holistic experience that goes beyond relaxation.

treatments.title: Facial Treatment
treatments.description: Revitalizing facial care for glowing skin
